001package events;
002
003import interfaces.DriverInterface;
004import interfaces.Event;
005import interfaces.IntersectionInterface;
006
007/**
008 * Changes the intersection mode and if the intersection is not idle, enqueues a
009 * second SwitchIsMode object
010 * @author anita
011 */
012public class SwitchIsMode extends Event{
013    
014    double arrivalTime;
015    IntersectionInterface Is;
016    public SwitchIsMode(IntersectionInterface Is, double arrivalTime){
017        
018        this.arrivalTime=arrivalTime;
019        this.Is=Is;  
020        this.setPriority(arrivalTime);
021        
022    }
023    
024    @Override
025    public void run(){
026        
027            double endModeTime=Is.changeMode();
028            Is.notifyAll(arrivalTime);
029            if (!Is.isIdle(arrivalTime)){
030                SwitchIsMode switch2=new SwitchIsMode(Is,endModeTime);
031                DriverInterface.getInstance().getQueue().enqueue(switch2);
032            }
033    }
034}
